title: Inside the Parker - Sheffield Shade, Lindor NY Struggles, George Floyd Verdict Player Reaction, Betting on the Bases
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Sheffield Shade, Lindor NY Struggles, George Floyd Verdict Player Reaction, Betting on the Bases
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob discusses Gary Sheffield's recent comments that he doesn't watch baseball today, Francisco Lindor's early struggles with the Mets, and the MLB player reaction to the George Floyd verdict. Also, Fair or Foul, Betting on the Bases,

Guests: 1990 World Series Champ Herm Winningham on the '90 Reds run, his experience playing in Montreal for the Expos, and why he doesn't enjoy watching today's MLB. Dodgers Reporter David Vassegh on if the Dodgers can break the all-time wins record, Mookie Betts injury scare, and Trevor Bauer's dominant start to his Dodgers career.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
